EmailTemplate.subject: Chorister Auditions: 26 July - Sing alongside Sydney's greatest!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
I'd like to invite you and your son to the St Andrew's Cathedral Chorister open auditions on Sunday 26 July. Details are below. Please note that bookings are essential.
I do hope you can come along. It's a wonderful opportunity to be part of something big!
Regards
Bruce Perry Registrar
St Andrew's Cathedral School
___________________________________________________________________
Chorister Auditions
Sing alongside Sydney's greatest
Does your son want to be part of one of the oldest musical groups in Australia?
St Andrew's Cathedral Choir has formed some of the most famous talent in our country. The choristers sing in Australia's oldest cathedral and in some of the world's most famous buildings.
Chorister scholarships for 2016 are now available for boys from Years 3 to 6 and include full time study at St Andrew's Cathedral School.
Join our open auditions on Sunday 26 July, 2015
10.30am following morning service at the Cathedral
The morning starts at St Andrew's Cathedral with a welcome by Ross Cobb, Director of Music. There will be an opportunity to speak with current students about their lives as Choristers, to join in singing with them as well as individual auditions for scholarships.
Bookings essential.
Please contact Alex Culas via aculas@sacs.nsw.edu.au or 9286 9579 to reserve a place

​You are receiving this invitation as you have previously indicated interest in enrolment at St Andrew’s Cathedral School. We would be delighted if your son were to audition for Choristers however, if you would like to unsubscribe from further invitations, please click here.
